achievements.name: Siege!
achievements.description: Successfully siege and capture a city by seizing its victory points during a campaign battle.

achievements.name: Champion of the Gods
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with a champion-type agent during a campaign.

achievements.name: Noble Master
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with a dignitary-type agent during a campaign.

achievements.name: Legendary Commander
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with a general / admiral during a campaign.

achievements.name: Spymaster
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with a spy-type agent during a campaign.

achievements.name: Veteranus
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with any unit during a campaign.

achievements.name: Conqueror
achievements.description: Capture 30 settlements.

achievements.name: Supremacy
achievements.description: Destroy or subjugate a faction.

achievements.name: Rome Wasn't Built in a Day
achievements.description: Fully expand and upgrade a province capital.

achievements.name: The Great Library
achievements.description: Research all available technologies in a single campaign.

achievements.name: The Die is Cast
achievements.description: Become involved in a civil war.

achievements.name: In the Footsteps of Great Men
achievements.description: Complete a campaign chapter’s primary objective and all associated historical objectives.

achievements.name: When in Rome…
achievements.description: Win a campaign by cultural victory.

achievements.name: Beyond the Dreams of Avarice
achievements.description: Win a campaign by economic victory.

achievements.name: I Came, I Saw, I Conquered
achievements.description: Win a campaign by military victory.

achievements.name: Imperator
achievements.description: Win a campaign on legendary difficulty.

achievements.name: This is Total War!
achievements.description: Win the game having declared war on every faction the turn you encountered them, as well as never negotiating a peace treaty.

achievements.name: Their Legacy Lives On
achievements.description: Win a campaign whilst fielding an army or fleet that has existed continuously since the start of your campaign.

achievements.name: Tempus Fugit
achievements.description: Play 20 campaign turns.

achievements.name: The Lost Eagle
achievements.description: Defeat someone who already has this achievement in any multiplayer battle.

achievements.name: Bloodthirsty
achievements.description: Kill 10,000 men in battle.

achievements.name: Butcher
achievements.description: Kill 100,000 men in battle.

achievements.name: Gore-drenched
achievements.description: Kill 1,000,000 men in battle.

achievements.name: Legatus Legionis
achievements.description: Win 50 land battles during campaign play.

achievements.name: Praefectus Classis
achievements.description: Win 50 naval battles during campaign play.

achievements.name: Walled Crown
achievements.description: Win 25 siege attack battles during campaign play.

achievements.name: Crown of the Preserver
achievements.description: Win 25 siege defence battles during campaign play.

achievements.name: Wipe Them Out… All of Them!
achievements.description: Win a campaign battle having completely wiped out all enemy units, a minimum of 1000 men, before claiming victory.

achievements.name: Slave-driver
achievements.description: Enslave 1000 battle captives.

achievements.name: Executioner
achievements.description: Execute 1000 battle captives.

achievements.name: Liberator
achievements.description: Release 1000 battle captives.

achievements.name: Vae Victis
achievements.description: Sack the city of Rome as a barbarian tribe in the Grand Campaign

achievements.name: I Will Find a Way or Make One
achievements.description: As Carthage, recruit a unit of elephants.

achievements.name: Status Quo
achievements.description: Achieve victory with any faction without getting involved in a secession or a civil war.

achievements.name: A League of Their Own
achievements.description: As Macedon, establish Athens, Epirus and Sparta as client states.

achievements.name: Field Commander
achievements.description: Win a quickmatch land multiplayer battle.

achievements.name: Primus Inter Pares
achievements.description: Win a multiplayer campaign.

achievements.name: Antagonist
achievements.description: Start at least 5 multiplayer campaigns.

achievements.name: Tactician
achievements.description: Play at least 10 multiplayer battles.

achievements.name: Master Tactician
achievements.description: Play at least 50 multiplayer battles.

achievements.name: Strategist
achievements.description: Complete a campaign on Hard difficulty.

achievements.name: Master Strategist
achievements.description: Complete a campaign on Very Hard difficulty.

achievements.name: Et tu…?
achievements.description: Successfully assassinate a member of your own family faction.

achievements.name: Vercingetorix
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Arverni.

achievements.name: The New Hannibal
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Carthage.

achievements.name: Pharaoh of the World
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Egypt.

achievements.name: British Empire
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Iceni.

achievements.name: Alexander's Legacy
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Macedon.

achievements.name: The New Xerxes
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Parthia.

achievements.name: Roma Invicta
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Rome.

achievements.name: Furor Germanicus
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Suebi.

achievements.name: Heir of Mithridates
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Pontus.

achievements.name: This is Sparta!
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Sparta.

achievements.name: Heir of Pyrrhus
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Epirus.

achievements.name: Philosopher King
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as Athens.

achievements.name: Auxilia
achievements.description: Complete 1 hour of gameplay.

achievements.name: Veteran
achievements.description: Complete 10 hours of gameplay.

achievements.name: Evocatus
achievements.description: Complete 100 hours of gameplay.

achievements.name: Augustus!
achievements.description: Complete 500 hours of gameplay.

achievements.name: God of War!
achievements.description: Complete 1000 hours of gameplay.

achievements.name: Quaestor
achievements.description: Complete the Prologue campaign.

achievements.name: Praetor
achievements.description: Issue 10 edicts in a single campaign.

achievements.name: Censor
achievements.description: Accumulate 1,000,000 talents in your treasury during a single campaign.

achievements.name: Pontifex Maximus
achievements.description: Construct a Pantheon during a Roman campaign.

achievements.name: Consul
achievements.description: Play 100 campaign turns.

achievements.name: Empire-builder
achievements.description: Capture 3 settlements.

achievements.name: Carthage Must Be Destroyed
achievements.description: Win the Siege of Carthage on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: The Alexandrine War
achievements.description: Win the Battle of the Nile on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Reclaiming the Desert
achievements.description: Win the Battle of Raphia on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Disaster Averted
achievements.description: Recover at least one legionary eagle from Teutoburg Forest on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: The Boat that Rocked
achievements.description: Successfully breach a wall using naval artillery in any battle.

achievements.name: Great Balls of Fire
achievements.description: Field a ballista or large onager artillery unit in a siege battle during a campaign game.

achievements.name: Unleash Hades!
achievements.description: Kill 200 men with siege artillery in any single battle.

achievements.name: Sightseeing
achievements.description: Successfully capture one of the great cities of the ancient world, Rome, Athens, Carthage or Alexandria, in battle.

achievements.name: Grand Tour
achievements.description: Successfully capture all of the great cities of the ancient world, Rome, Athens, Carthage and Alexandria, in battle during a single campaign game.

achievements.name: Weapon of Mass Destruction
achievements.description: Kill 5000 men in battle with siege artillery during the course of a campaign game.

achievements.name: Impenetrable Wall
achievements.description: Successfully defend a city without losing a single victory point during a campaign battle.

achievements.name: Ambush!
achievements.description: Successfully ambush and defeat an enemy army in a campaign battle.

achievements.name: Surprise!
achievements.description: Successfully defeat the enemy when ambushed during a campaign.

achievements.name: The Great Escape
achievements.description: Successfully escape from a campaign ambush battle with at least 75% of your starting units.

achievements.name: Seize the Initiative!
achievements.description: Attack an encampment and win without losing more than 15% of your starting force.

achievements.name: Hold Your Ground!
achievements.description: Successfully defend an encampment, during a campaign, without losing more than 10% of your starting force.

achievements.name: Look to the Defences
achievements.description: Successfully defend an encampment, during a campaign, without losing more than 25% of your starting force.

achievements.name: In the Navy!
achievements.description: Fight a battle with naval units in any campaign.

achievements.name: On Land & Sea
achievements.description: Fight a combined battle during a campaign using both land and naval forces.

achievements.name: Dock of the Bay
achievements.description: Fight a combined land and naval siege battle during a campaign.

achievements.name: Rostra
achievements.description: Sink more than 10 enemy ships in a single campaign battle.

achievements.name: First Time Lucky
achievements.description: Use at least 1 special ability during a campaign battle.

achievements.name: The Power of Three
achievements.description: Use at least 3 different special abilities during a campaign battle.

achievements.name: Veni, Vidi, Vici!
achievements.description: Complete an entire campaign, winning every battle, without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Close but No Amphora
achievements.description: Complete an entire campaign, winning every battle except one, without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Every Day I'm not Auto-resolving
achievements.description: Complete an entire campaign, with 10 or fewer defeats, without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Centurion
achievements.description: Fight 100 battles in a single campaign without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Decurion
achievements.description: Fight 10 battles in a single campaign without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Optio
achievements.description: Fight a battle from the campaign map without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Alae
achievements.description: Win a campaign battle, using only cavalry units, without auto-resolving.

achievements.name: Mare Nostrum
achievements.description: Win 25 or more naval battles in a single campaign game.

achievements.name: Balanced Force
achievements.description: Win a campaign battle using one of every class of land unit: melee infantry, missile infantry, missile cavalry, melee cavalry, siege weapons.

achievements.name: Carthago Delenda Est
achievements.description: As Rome, destroy the Carthaginian faction.

achievements.name: Legio Victrix
achievements.description: Attain the maximum rank with an army or navy during a campaign game.

achievements.name: This Army Will Fight On
achievements.description: Recover at least two legionary eagles from Teutoburg Forest on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Masters of Germania
achievements.description: Recover all three legionary eagles from Teutoburg Forest on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Bello Gallico
achievements.description: Complete the entire Caesar in Gaul campaign.

achievements.name: The Gallic War
achievements.description: Win the Battle of Alesia on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: The Punic War
achievements.description: Win the Battle of Zama on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Pincer Movement
achievements.description: Win the Battle of Cannae on normal difficulty or higher.

achievements.name: Arevaci Ascendant
achievements.description: Complete the Hannibal at the Gates campaign as the Arevaci.

achievements.name: Ba'al-Hammon Be Praised
achievements.description: Complete the Hannibal at the Gates campaign as Carthage.

achievements.name: In The Name Of Cariociecus
achievements.description: Complete the Hannibal at the Gates campaign as the Lusitani.

achievements.name: Africanus
achievements.description: Complete the Hannibal at the Gates campaign as Rome.

achievements.name: Get Heiro, Baby

achievements.name: Hoist the Colours!
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Ardiaei.

achievements.name: We Can’t Axe for More

achievements.name: Struck a Nervii
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Nervii.

achievements.name: Thrace for Impact
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Odrysian Kingdom.

achievements.name: Put On Your Red Light
achievements.description: Complete a campaign as the Roxolani.

achievements.name: Phalanx But No Thanks

achievements.name: Spartan Supremacy

achievements.name: A Relic of the Past
achievements.description: Declare war on a faction in Single player or Multiplayer Campaign during MWNL2,  between 00:01GMT on 12/02/2015 to 23:59 GMT on 15/02/2015.

achievements.name: Company of Zeroes, more like…
achievements.description: Win a single battle during MWNL2 (any battle type in single player campaign, or multiplayer campaign), between 00:01GMT on 12/02/2015 to 23:59 GMT on 15/02/2015.

achievements.name: Make War, Not Love
achievements.description: Win at least one battle (any battle type in single player campaign, or multiplayer campaign) on 14/02/2015, Valentine’s Day.

achievements.name: Horse Called 'War'
achievements.description: Complete the Empire Divided campaign as the Alani.

achievements.name: Unity is Power
achievements.description: Complete the Empire Divided campaign as Armenia.

achievements.name: There Can Be Only One

achievements.name: Asking for Trouble

achievements.name: Almost Famous

achievements.name: Unitas in Varitete

achievements.name: Conquered Carthage Before it was Cool

achievements.name: Etruscan Megapolis
achievements.description: Develop all buildings in the Etruscan capital to level 6.

achievements.name: Warring States

achievements.name: Rome in Flames

achievements.name: Old School Republic

achievements.name: Great Dynasty

achievements.name: Bloody Murder
achievements.description: Kill or wound 300 characters with Champion actions.

achievements.name: Scythian Legend
